function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting vaccination, and monitoring health status","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, air purification systems, and contactless technology","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building management, health authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of misinformation and misinterpretation","Impact":"Misinterpretation of health-related data and misinformation about contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Providing accurate and clear communication, educating the public about health data interpretation, and fact-checking information sources","Technologies":"Health communication platforms, data visualization tools, and information verification systems","People":"General public, researchers, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health authorities, media organizations, and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Psychological impact of risk perception","Impact":"Increased anxiety and stress due to perceived risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Psychological support, mental health services, and promoting positive coping strategies","Technologies":"Online counseling platforms, mental health apps, and stress management tools","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, and building management"}]}
